titles.title: He Paid A Debt He Did Not Owe

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He paid a debt He did not owe.
I owed a debt I could not pay.
I needed someone to wash my sins away.
And now I sing a brand new song :
'Amazing grace' (...all day long).
Christ Jesus paid a debt that I could never pay.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
La deuda que El no debia pago.
Yo tenia una deuda que no pude pagar.
Necesitaba de alguien, para mis pecados limpiar.
Ahora canto una nueva cancion:
'Gracia gloriosa'
Cristo Jesus pago la deuda que debia yo.
